ServerPackage

Class MySQLJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerPackage.MySQLJDBC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDBCredentials

    public class MySQLJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDBCredentials
    This Class connects to the database and initializes the database to the set values in the main method.
    Author:
    Steven Ha, Andrew Eom, Baylee Cheung

      • insertCourseUserPreparedStatement

        public void insertCourseUserPreparedStatement(java.lang.String courseName,
                                              int courseNum,
                                              int sectionNum,
                                              int secCap)
        inserts a course into the database
        Parameters:
        courseName - the name of the course (ex. "ENSF")
        courseNum - the number of the course (ex. 409)
        sectionNum - the section number of the created course
        secCap - the section cap for max number of students

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args0)
        The main method to create and add information to the database. Please comment out the lines 194-244 after the program has run once to create the database
